General.Name: Simei Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Simei Media Co.,Ltd. operates as an advertising company in China. The company offers brand management, creative advertising, entertainment content, digital interaction, full-borne media planning and buying, public relations promotion, effectiveness measurement, media planning and agency, and outdoor advertising services, as well as digital marketing and other integrated communication services. It engages in IP sourcing; digital reading and copyright operations, and services comprising digital reading and audio operations; short videos, information flow, and social e-commerce services; and innovation and integration of projects. In addition, the company is involved in all-media planning and agency of TV, internet, outdoor, radio, newspapers, and magazines, as well as various shows and film and television drama publicity; and planning, production, and distribution of TV dramas and film content, and related services of film and television content. Further, it provides information transmission, software, and information technology services; and radio, television, film, and recording production services, as well as business services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
